author: Ryan Elliott
releaseNotes:
v0.4.8 - Hotfix for static charge variable.
v0.4.7 - Added option for static charges.
v0.4.6 - Hotfix for logic to clear input selections from the advanced menu.
v0.4.5 - Made device selection and app name sections dynamically hide/unhide based on installation status.
v0.4.3 - Hotfix for input selection for reset options.
v0.4.2 - Added additional reset options for devices.

For further information or to report issues/request features, please see the community thread https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-energy-calculator-plus/108660
